objects.description: [certutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0160) has been used to decode binaries hidden inside certificate files as Base64 information.(Citation: Malwarebytes Targeted Attack against Saudi Arabia)

external_references.description: Malwarebytes Labs. (2017, March 27). New targeted attack against Saudi Arabia Government. Retrieved July 3, 2017.
external_references.source_name: Malwarebytes Targeted Attack against Saudi Arabia
